work.name: wanderer.moe
work.description:
Created wanderer.moe at 15, an open-source centralized game assets hosting website that handles thousands of daily requests and users. 
Backend: Typescript, Turso (LibSQL), Hono, Cloudflare R2, DO & Resend hosted on Cloudflare Workers. 
Frontend: NextJS, TailwindCSS, and Typescript with shadcn/ui on Cloudflare Pages. 
Site translations handled through Crowdin.

work.name: hyv-fps-unlocker
work.description:
Developed a lightweight Rust CLI which modifies Registry Entries for various games, allowing users to bypass defaults and set custom FPS values. 
Currently undergoing a rewrite with Tauri (Rust & Svelte) to support additional methods of unlocking.

work.name: wuwa-fps-unlocker
work.description:
Simple Rust program that alters the LocalStorage DB file for Wuthering Waves to set FPS to a non-default value. 
Supports automatic detection of primary monitor's refresh rate for ease of use.

work.name: Lucia Auth
work.description:
Lucia is a lightweight Authentication Library in Typescript suitable for practically any environment. 
Contributed towards documentation, specifically usage within Cloudflare Workers environments.

work.name: vmt
work.description:
Developed a Discord bot in discord.py utilizing DeepL and Google Speech Recognition API for transcribing and translating voice messages. 
Particularly useful for overcoming communication barriers. Includes a Dockerfile for straightforward deployment.
